Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Kelly C
Reviews.Content: booked hotel 3 girls visiting amsterdam friendly staff happily locked luggage safe arrived departure comfy equiped clean loved decoration deffinately recommend travelling amsterdam hesitate return stay friends family

Reviews.Title: “Lovely stay, modern hotel and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: RachP93
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel 11am knowing wasnt available 2pm wed check ready wasnt luggage store rid hotel modern welcoming bar breakfast fire lovely 43 top hotel little veranda memory foam mattress chairs table en suite decorated lovely huge plasma television definately request location 5 minutes centraal station didnt 20 minutes 10 minutes dam square 20 minutes red light district look 10 minutes lovely little restaurants restaurants hotel dont didnt eat overall lovely trip didnt pay low expectations extremely pleased witht quality service received definately recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel with a few drawbacks”
Reviews.Author: Dohfar
Reviews.Content: essentially hotel stars drag bit happily stay location central amsterdam 5min walk centraal station 10min walk dam square 15mins tram rijksmuseum lots restaurants cafes nearby supermarket short walk albert heijn left leaving hotel clean quality furnishings free wifi internet terminal limits helpful laidback staff drawbacks slight lack maintenance unreliable safe shower properly sink slow drain daft colour scheme black furniture black wooden floors curtains dark walls hotel sombre air bed mattress soft support soso breakfast served cramped reception seedy dark spuistraat surrounding streets avoid walking parallel

Reviews.Author: Bladette1981
Reviews.Content: amsterdam 10 ago decided book surprise trip 3 nights jan xmas pressie fr half friends accompany warned drink prices gone â£7 pint pleasently surprised entering hotel cans 2 euro reception hotel bar unfortunately hotel doesnt food apart inclusive brekfast lovely hotel booked via alpharooms 44 friends 23 0 paid stay â£200 couple comparitively wasnt value money frills larger bathroom adequate warm top floor lift help definately recommend hotel staff helpful breakkie expected location lovely food italians hotel walk upwards left restaurant called left main door walk yourself hand short walk hotel liked irish pub italians genuine irish barmaid hotel quiet night hear tram slightly didnt bother looking clean budget hotel central location

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: SussexHoney
Reviews.Content: walked originally booked hotel awful found sint nicolaas lovely looking town spotless bathroom plenty boiling hot water clean staff anymore helpful gentleman night security guard breakfast eat receptionbar roaring fire atmosphere friendly bottle champagne celebrate nice touch rate included breakfast tax money awful hotel include items minutes walk celebrations 100 recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location”

Reviews.Content: enjoyed experience hotel sint nicolaas decent size europe bed comfy third floor purple photos marilyn monroe hall floor decor hotel staff helped book fantastic dinner cruise friendly welcomed smile hello hours day breakfast included key served 10 am location couldnt main walking street takes dam hotel central station 5 minute walk super convenient youre taking train andor city definitely stay

Reviews.Content: hotel loved atmosphere oldworld distinctive stayed amsterdam 3x 6 months favorite hotel exception excellence frontdesk attendant nightshift total jerk 3 days getting coffee lobby coffee machine staff warm smiles night coffee past 3 days jerk attacked insisting 2 euro spot petty 2 euro insignificant gross unprofessionalism guy behaved payed 1000 usd hotel stay maybe guy cup coffee slide time hell charge 2 euro nonaggressive ok instead total attack mode petty cup coffee guy liability hotel fired operation homeless tramp warming lobby started nonsense asian rest staff exemplary

Reviews.Title: “compact, clean, tidy, friendly, great location.”

Reviews.Content: wife amsterdam weekend time researched usual hotel sint choice train station easily accessible airport trains run 10minutes amsterdam central bought return tickets easy loaded directions amsterdam central hotel sint easy follow probably 15 minutes walk hotel learn green cross code reverse hundreds cyclists plus trams cars taxis alert hotel staff helpful fourth floor clean tidy couldnt operate safe informed staff reception immediately fixed free breakfast typical continental found substantial hear trams running window bad window closed hotel central expected bother flat screen tv bbc1 itv tram frequency lessened evening dont ran night asleep woke free internet didnt guests lot walking visited ann franks house moving couple art galleries flower market worth visit lots tulip bulbs red light district worth visit girls friendly waving ego read photograph girls doing girl bananas banging window truth beach hotel situated store luggage check straight airport minute sight seeing flight wasnt late evening parks rays sun

Reviews.Title: “would go back and would recomend to friends”
Reviews.Author: sueandglen
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel situation normal noise amsterdam bothered trams nice clean hotel staff helpful amsterdam stayed road honestly hotel 10 times

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected!”
Reviews.Author: darrylstott1
Reviews.Content: read hundreds reviews hotels finally settled hotel location 5 minutes walk central station tram line stylish tad faded disappointing bathroom beds comfortable triple facing tramline placing bed window noisier normal night sleep disruption breakfast continental affair included price staff helpful english speaking played sense humour overall enjoyable stay location perfect experience youre struggling decide price chances wont disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Worth every penny!”
Reviews.Author: MicheBud
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights february 2011 partner couldnt hotel location train station spuistraat easily reached centre hotel extremely helpful friendly staff warm cosy windows required air con plenty electric sockets length mirrors safe alarm clock nice shower soap dispensers shower wash basin remote tv plenty english speaking channels surprisingly quiet location nights sleep cleaner day replace clean breakfast continental buffet downstairs bar fire tv 3 pcs convenient check line return flights staff print boarding passes free wifi checking 11am luggage ticketed kept safe locked storeroom free till collect definitely return soon top tip designer 15 minute train haarlem shopping experience willie coffee shop recommended amsterdam try locally recommended eat lunch 7 fresh produce own greenhouse eggs own hens booking 41 32 tastiest soup ice bar 3 free drinks incl entry fee visit anne franks house buy fast track tickets line beat queues found buying tickets attractions line saves money

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is beautiful, charming, clean and staffed with the kindest of the kind!”
Reviews.Author: sorrento728
Reviews.Content: sint nicolaas walking distance centraal station situated 2 streets bathroom modern equipped including hair dryer complimentary breakfast excellent free 3 laptops lobby nice bonus bed incredibly comfortable green ecofriendly feature key inserted slot lights staff genuinely stay comfortable helpful gorgeous hotel city taste traditional amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!!!”
Reviews.Author: JMichelle89
Reviews.Content: hotel easy located near central station prob 5 10 minute walk pretty dead centre amsterdam hotel nice comfortable vibe staff extremely helpful nice comfy pricequality breakfast morning unlimited free acces wifi definitely stay visit amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “NEVER book this hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel close main railway station plus stay short hotel weekend trip amsterdam arrival top floor 4th heating 5 hours heat bit othewise sould sleeping internet guys desk bit helpful elevator 3rd floor reason broke carry 4th floor steep narrow corridor pictures look nice actually web page promise bad

Reviews.Title: “We would love to stay there again!”
Reviews.Author: kaydc
Reviews.Content: stayed sint nicolaas 3 nights cant helpfulness friendliness staff especially recommended wonderful typical dutch restaurant vicinity comfortable spotless free wifi throughout hotel enjoyed drink fireside lobby continental breakfast offered wide variety choices location ideal touring day trips train short walk station lots varied restaurants sights amsterdam easy walking distance hot window bed slept comfortably

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Hotel”

Reviews.Content: returned fanastic break amsterdam feel write positive review hotel sint nicolaas firstly bad reviews hotel justified husband found clean spacious nicely decorated comfortable cry previous reviews believe hotel recently renovated actions staff promote standards friendly atmosphere breakfast fresh filling hotel location beaten 3 mins walk station stay return amsterdam future staff little hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location near the train station”
Reviews.Author: BadenBilly
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights recommend hotel staff exceptionally helpful thanks jos reservations calling taxis etc recently renovated clean comfortable provide breakfast speed internet access location reasonable price

Reviews.Title: “would go back again in a flash”
